column1: Jatayu dies fighting Ravana while protecting Sita.
Anjaneya jumps across the ocean to reach Lanka island.
Raghava shatters Shiva's divine bow during the swayamvara ceremony.
Saumitri accompanies his elder brother into forest exile.
King Janaka discovers Vaidehi while ploughing the sacred field.
Bharata governs Ayodhya using Rama's sandals as royal symbol.
Maruti destroys parts of the Ashoka garden in Lanka.
The demon king abducts Janaki from Panchavati forest.
Kumbhakarna slumbers for six months and stays awake for six months.
Sampati helps the monkey army locate Sita with his keen eyesight.
